mapper.sql: id, did, promote, rebate, reward, gift, description, date, status
mapper.select: select t.*, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from dealer_value t left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t.*, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from dealer_value t left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.status=0 and de.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" order by t.date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select t.*, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from dealer_value t left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.status=0 order by t.date desc
limit ${offset}, ${pageSize}

select t.*, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from dealer_value t left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0 order by t.date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from dealer_value t left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where de.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0
select count(*) from dealer_value where status=0

select t.*, de.id as deid,de.name as dename from dealer_value t left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.date <= #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.date >= #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.status=0 order by t.date desc

select t.*, de.id as deid,de.name as dename,de.eid as deeid from dealer_value t left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where de.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.date <= #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.date >= #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.status=0 order by t.date desc
mapper.insert:
insert into dealer_value
id,
did,
promote,
rebate,
reward,
gift,
description,
date,
status,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{promote,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{rebate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{reward,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{gift,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update dealer_value
did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
promote = #{promote,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
rebate = #{rebate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
reward = #{reward,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
gift = #{gift,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dealer_value set did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, promote = #{promote,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, rebate = #{rebate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, reward = #{reward,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gift = #{gift,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
